verbs.description: [ARG1: CNN anchor Jake Tapper] [V: appeared] [ARGM-PRP: to plug his novel The Hellfire Club on ABC 's The View on Wednesday] . Mostly , the View wanted him to pronounce on the Trump tweet of the day on the " fake news " ( and the MRC study showing 91 percent of the evening - news coverage of Trump was negative from January to April ) .
